DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>: An archive install job that downloads, extracts, and optionally configures a tool.
Direct URL to an archive file (zip, tar.gz, etc).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.DownloadPath: Directory where the archive will be downloaded before extraction.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.ExtractTo.<V: Destination directory where the archive contents will be extracted.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.StripTopLeve: If true, removes the top-level folder inside the archive during extraction.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.CheckPath.<V: Path that must exist after install (used for install/status detection).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.EnableServic: If true, attempts to enable/start a service after install (only if applicable).
Shell commands executed after extraction (symlinks, permissions, setup).
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.PostUninstal: Shell commands executed during uninstall cleanup.
DESCRIPTION.<MODEL_ID>.Archive.<VALUES>.TrashPaths.<: Extra paths to remove during cleanup (old directories or files).
